item.title: About
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: I am a third-year PhD Student at The University of Edinburgh, working in the Computational Cognitive Science Lab with Neil Bramley and Chris Lucas. My PhD is funded by the German Academic Scholarship Foundation and ESRC. I am broadly interested in intelligence research (natural, artificial) with a passion for probabilistic programming and program induction. Prior to joining The University of Edinburgh, I pursued a Master’s degree in Cognitive and Decision Sciences from University College London working with David Lagnado’s Causal Cognition Lab.
